name: Lifeless Voyage
description:
Have you ever wondered what only a gray world would look like ? Well, you are trapped in this scary world where nothing even moves ! Fortunately, there are things called medals. When you place a medal on something, you can control it ! Try escaping logical and hard  levels using  the medals !

We combine : 

  • happy and sad
  •  medals(mechanics) with objects
  • movement and stop 

controls:

"a" and " d" to move 

"space" to jump

"esc" to quit 

left click to click/kill / drag medals
